basics.name: Hassan Oyeboade
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Solution-oriented and self-driven software engineer with 4 years of expertise in frontend and backend development, system design, deployment, project planning, etc. An excellent communicator with demonstrated stakeholder management skills. Fast learner with the ability to deliver solutions as an individual and as part of a team. Proficient in Python, Javascript, PostgreSQL, MySQL.

work.summary:
Built internal services that interact with 3rd party APIs like Slack, Jira which increased  project velocity by 30%
Built a Node.js API that verify visitors to a secured residential area for a mobile app
Worked with other team members to deploy to Google Compute Engine (GCE) and Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE) 
Set up monitoring systems to deployed services which ensured prompt response to services outage and reduced downtime duration
Developed a payment system for a Restaurant app using PayPal commerce integration
Improved slow API responses and used Redis and Celery to handle time-consuming API requests
Managed a team of 4 to build an iOS app while working on the backend API

Developed tested API endpoints using Python, Django and Django Rest Framework to support web and mobile users while working in a small team
Achieved an increase in app monetization by collaborating with team members to design and implement features that impact app monetization

Implemented REST API endpoints using NodeJS/Express, Flask/Flask Restful and Django /Django Rest Framework
Designed and built internal web applications while working in an agile team
Wrote unit and integration tests using TDD approach, performed Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery, and wrote End to End tests using Selenium
Used Git for version control and Github for collaboration 
Mentored and reviewed Pull requests for junior developers on different technologies
Conducted technical interviews to determine fit for prospective Andela Engineers

Modified the data storage service on the back end to use AWS Aurora instead of DynamoDB which ensured super cost-effective throughputs
Designed responsive UI pages using HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, Angular
Used Git and Gitlab for version control and collaboration

Implemented REST API endpoints using Python/Django/Django Rest Framework and added features to the app SOAP/XML wrapper using NodeJS
Set up async processes using celery, mail subscription systems, promotion features, and updated AWS Elastic Beanstalk deployment
Worked with other developers on payment system implementation using Stripe endpoints
Integrated test coverage measurement with Codecov
